changeSet.author: zlatkov
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `country` ( `id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `created_by` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `created_date` datetime(6) DEFAULT NULL, `last_modified_by` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `last_modified_date` datetime(6) DEFAULT NULL, `capital` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `code` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `continent` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `country_name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `nationality` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;
